make_turn(action: str, direction: Optional[str] = None) → tuple[game_engine.field.response.RespHandler | None, game_engine.entities.player.Player]¶

active player makes turk with provided action and direction checks players ability to make provided action

Returns

turn response object if action is available, current player object
